summary: Adds the arrows from the mod 'arrows of might' to NPCs.
descriptionHtml:
[u]Description[/u]
Fire/Ice/Lightning/Stun/Impact arrows added to:
-Bandits
-Imperial Soldiers
-City Guards

[u]Requirements[/u]
-Charrio's [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11126]Arrows Of Might[/url] mod

[u]Installation[/u]
Unzip the esp file into your data directory. Use your favorite mod manager to modify the load order. Ensure that AOMforNPCs.esp loads after the original ArrowsOfMight.esp

[u]Credit[/u]
-Charrio for making the original mod
-Requested by Kazagarumanesh

[u]Also check out[/u]
-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21659/]Craftable Crossbows & Bolts[/url]
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21661]Crossbow Bolts For Vendors[/url]
-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56811/]Better Alchemist's Shack[/url]
-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22029/]Arrows of Might for NPCs[/url]
author: remnantsoldier
